page.title: 03AN ADULT'S DAY IN LOCHFOOT
page.content: AWOKE TO A DRY MORNING.MADE MY HUSBAND'S LUNCH_TIME SANDWICHES AND SAW HIM OFF TO WORK.OUR DAUGHTER,SON AND I HAD BREAKFAST AND SET OFF TO WALK TO SCHOOL AT 8.30,PICKING UP THREE NEPHEWS AND A NEIGHBOUR'S CHILD ON THE WAY.COLLECTED NEWSPAPERS FROM VILLAGE SHOP BEFORE RETURNING HOME TO DO USUAL CHORES OF WASHING DISHES,MAKING BEDS,CLEANING OUT FIRE,FEEDING PET POODLE AND TIDYING UP.LEFT HOME AT 11.30 TO DO MEALS_ON_WHEELS,COLLECTING TEN MEALS FROM TWO SCHOOLS AND DELIVERING THEM BY 1.30.KNITTED,MADE DINNER.BUTCHER'S VAN ARRIVED.IN THE EVENING HELPED CATERER FRIEND TO SERVE MEALS AT LOCAL RUGBY CLUB.RETURNED HOME AT 11.30 TO FIND HUSBAND AND CHILDREN SOUND ASLEEP.A SATISFYING LIFESTYLE.
